name: Kathy Haynie
text: This is such a relaxing place.  The staff is very friendly.  Daniel is one of the best tea mixers and provides service with a smile.  He travels from Birmingham for work most days,  and has a personality that brings you back.  There are so many choices (teas and coffee) to choose from and I haven't tried one yet that I don't like.

name: Logan Charest
text:
Was so excited to try out the new venue for our favorite tea place around and it did not disappoint at all. In fact, I would say in every aspect they have went above and beyond.

All of our drinks were incredible, the employees were great and super nice (even replacing my son's strawberry milk he dropped in the parking lot), and the entire place just oozed form and wonderful tea.

Going to try and make it soon for the farmers market or some live music if they have that anytime soon!

Thank You Piper and Leaf and welcome to Morgan County!

name: Ginger Clements
text: The location is not too far out of town for the beautiful tea house and the delicious beverages they offer. We took our teas outside to their porch and enjoyed watching a passing rain shower and let life slow down for a few minutes. The only change I hope to see is a better access road, but I'll gladly brave the potholes to enjoy the experience often.

name: Destiny Stokes
text: I love the selection, and the employee that I've met. He's very friendly and kind. It can be a bit pricy, but an occasional treat it's nice. I would heavily recommend the chocatea. Tastes like chocolate but it's not heavy!

name: Gina Pieczynski
text: The turkey sandwich was really good. We loved the bread it was made on. Looking forward to trying the different teas we brought home. The place was very clean and the guys were really friendly. The tea I tried "The Sweet Dixie" was also really yummy.

name: Kim Lang
text: I enjoy going here..the people are friendly and kind..the products are good specially the front porch special, orchard peach. Love sitting on their porch too

name: adella jackson
text: Love this place so much! they have great tea, coffee,  and apparel. They offer such great varieties of herbal and black tea highly recommended!

name: Charlotte White
text: Needs more sandwiches. Tea and coffee is great.

name: Ace Wolf
text: We had a a splendid 1st visit. I purchased some oil for my mother. The staff was very informative and helpful.

name: Allison R. Widener
text:
I called to ask about CBD oil for my pup who has cancer. The owner called me back quickly and gave detailed instructions on the products she has and advise on how to use them.
I can tell she takes pride in what she has in the store, and carries top quality product.
Her husband was in the shop when I arrived and was very kind and sympathetic to my situation.

I don't know how much time I have with my furbaby, but if she is still with me in a couple months when the oil runs out, I will definitely return here for more.

Thank you Herbal Toad for all your kindness, and for taking time to explain everything to me.

name: Cathy Green
text: Great customer service!  They helped me track down a stylist from salon who had cut my hair while I was in town for a funeral several years ago.  They walked a couple stores down to their new neighbor, Salon 126, to get me the name and number.  You really went above and beyond!

name: Stephanie Moore
text: It's a awesome place. And you can tell they know what they are talking about.

name: Samuel Coleridge
text: Great assortment of herbs and soaps! Great class!

name: Emily Pritchett
text: What a great shop for our town! Stephenie is an educated aromatherapist and is more than willing to provide individualized advice for whatever issue you have. This is a wonderful asset to Ozark.

resp.text: Thank you. We appreciate your business and you taking time to leave a review.

name: Shirley Beasley
text: The staff was very knowledgeable and they had exactly what I was looking for

name: Justin Dugans
text: Great place to shop and receive knowledge on essential oils, Stephanie is very helpful and honest along with the prices being great for the items.
